markdownRemark.excerpt: What is new? Changes included in the Open Data Hub v1.7.0 release: ODH Dashboard v2.10 & v2.11 New Notebooks available for incubation in ODH - Code Serverâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
What is new?

Changes included in the Open Data Hub v1.7.0 release:

  • ODH Dashboard v2.10 & v2.11
  • New Notebooks available for incubation in ODH - Code Server Notebook, R Studio Notebook (CPU & CUDA)
  • Data Science Pipelines Operator v1.0.0
  • Model Mesh
  • TrustyAI Explainability
  • Distributed Workloads v0.0.4

Notable Changes

  • With this release, the ODH Operator will now bundle a local copy of the ODH Core manifests into the container image giving administrators the option to automatically update components to the latest ODH release from the OpenShift OperatorHub

The following is a list of components that are available in v1.7.0 release of odh-manifests:

Technology Version Category
Open Data Hub Dashboard v2.11
Open Data Hub Notebook Images
Model Mesh Serving v0.11.0
Data Science Pipelines Operator v1.0.0
TrustyAI Explainability v0.1.0
Distributed Workloads
* CodeFlare Operator v0.0.4
* Multi-Cluster App Dispatcher v1.31.0
* CodeFlare-SDK v0.4.4
* InstaScale v0.0.4
* KubeRay v0.5.0		 v0.0.4
